amendment.description: To require the Medicare Payment Advisory Commission to conduct a study regarding disproportionate share hospital payments under the medicare program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 984 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 984 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S8335-8336; text: CR S8335) To require the Medicare Payment Advisory Commission to conduct a study regarding disproportionate share hospital payments under the medicare program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 984 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 984 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
